attributes.name: "Bear in Meadow" Painting
attributes.description: A serene oil painting in an ash wood frame. No one is quite sure how the artist got the bear in this painting to stand still for six hours.

attributes.name: "Beyond the Gate" Painting
attributes.description: A haunting watercolor painting in a maple wood frame. It is so rich with atmosphere that the viewer can almost feel the chilly mist on their skin.

attributes.name: Bloody Place Setting
attributes.description: You treat your dinner guests with respect, but also gently remind them that you can have them killed at any time.

attributes.name: Brass Telescope
attributes.description: This state-of-the-art brass telescope is a great comfort for former sailors who once used the stars to navigate the open sea.

attributes.name: Brush Set with Parcels
attributes.description: With this beautiful brush set with matching case, you, too, can succeed in the world of business.

attributes.name: Burlap Sack
attributes.description: What's in this sack? Potatoes? Beans? Diamonds?... Might be diamonds.

attributes.name: Calligraphy Brush Set
attributes.description: Practice your fanciest handwriting with this brush set. There is even a book with examples of all the letters in several styles.

attributes.name: Campfire Cooking Set
attributes.description: Cooking is a very important survival skill in Aeternum. Anyone who has ever tried to eat raw boar meat will understand why.

attributes.name: Canteen Set
attributes.description: Technically, this canteen is meant to be used for water.

attributes.name: Captain's Writing Set
attributes.description: Nothing can be more final than a threatening letter to your enemies. Except, perhaps, how your enemies might respond to said letter.

attributes.name: Cartographer's Tools
attributes.description: These tools once belonged to the most talented cartographer who ever sailed the Mediterranean Sea.

attributes.name: Cauldron Cooking Set
attributes.description: In the Old World, a good cauldron was often passed down through the generations. Here in Aeternum, nothing gets passed down.

attributes.name: Cerulean Place Setting
attributes.description: Is this the aftermath of a meal, or the beforemath? (Beforemath is a common word in Aeternum.)

attributes.name: Cherry Place Setting
attributes.description: This tableware is almost too pretty to use, unless you're hungry, and the bright red placemat makes you real hungry for fresh fruit.

attributes.name: Clouded Glass Jug
attributes.description: The very last bottle of this particular vintage left in the world.

attributes.name: "Clouds of Heaven" Painting
attributes.description: A colorful blockprint in a dark wood frame. The skill of the printer is clearly displayed in the overlapping washes of color in the clouds.

attributes.name: Cluttered Dishes
attributes.description: They might be messy, but at least they're clean.

attributes.name: Dark Wicker-Wrapped Jug
attributes.description: Aeternum has adopted the European tradition of wrapping glass bottles in wicker to prevent breakage and spoilage.

attributes.name: Decorative Glass Bottle
attributes.description: This bottle will go perfectly with the shiplap you just installed.

attributes.name: Delphinium Wreath
attributes.description: Hanging a wreath of delphiniums on your door or in your window means that you're ready for visitors. Hope the place is clean!

attributes.name: Desk Accessories
attributes.description: You can write about whatever you want with this desk set. It's here to support you and your literary dreams.

attributes.name: Dirty Dishes
attributes.description: Washing the dishes can be a risky proposition when you have to go down to the river to do it. But the mallet does provide some protection.

attributes.name: Dumpling Steamer Set
attributes.description: These bamboo baskets will serve up plump, glistening, perfectly-steamed dumplings.

attributes.name: Extra Long Iron Chain
attributes.description: After a life at sea, many pirates can't get to sleep without the soothing rattle of iron chains.

attributes.name: Fireplace Accessories
attributes.description: A bellows for the optimists. A bucket of water for the realists.

attributes.name: Fireplace Books
attributes.description: What better place to store your precious books than near an open flame?

attributes.name: Fireplace Poker Set
attributes.description: Many a retired adventurer has spent their golden years poking at the fire and thinking of the past.

attributes.name: Firewood Pile
attributes.description: The wood is cured to perfection for a clean, long-lasting burn.

attributes.name: Fishing Net Decoration
attributes.description: The fibers of this old fishing net remember the struggle of every fish it ever caught.

attributes.name: Flintlock Pistols
attributes.description: These beautiful flintlock pistols have a walnut stock and a top firing rate of three rounds per minute.

attributes.name: "Flying Dutchman" Painting
attributes.description: A timeworn painting in an oval frame. After lights out, sailors used to trade whispered stories about ghost ships like the one in this painting.

attributes.name: Fragrant Incense Censer
attributes.description: Incense has been burned in China since Neolithic times. Your house smells amazing now.

attributes.name: Garlic Bulb Wreath
attributes.description: Vampire proof. And strangely, also keeps your friends from visiting. Is it because of the stench, or are they vampires?

attributes.name: Glass Demijohn Jug
attributes.description: Just the thing you needed for your pennies. Before long, it is going to be impossible to lift.

attributes.name: Goldenrod Place Setting
attributes.description: A beautiful place setting increases anticipation for the coming meal.

attributes.name: Gothic Place Setting
attributes.description: With this place setting, any meal becomes a kingly feast.

attributes.name: Grassy Place Setting
attributes.description: You might just lose sight of your meal if you were to have a picnic on the grass, that is, if the ants don't get to it first.

attributes.name: Green Clay Pot
attributes.description: The cheerful green color seems to keep the contents fresher.

attributes.name: Grog Crate
attributes.description: A crate of grog bottles. It might not be fancy, but at least there's a lot of it.

attributes.name: Hanging Pottery
attributes.description: Best to keep the inside of that pot up and out of sight. You don't wanna know what's in itâ€¦
